skillTree.localised_description: A true Lord knows the Underway, his Dwarfhold and how to fight under the ground better than anyone.

effects.description:
Leadership: +6 when fighting against Skaven
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +6 during subterranean siege battles
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +6 during subterranean intercept battles
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This stubborn Dwarf refuses to yield or tire, and ensures his followers are of the same ilk.
To fire the forges and bring true craft and artifice back into the world.
This Lord belts out orders and can be heard even across a battlefield smothered in the grim noise of war.
The endless courage of the Warrior God, directed to bolster this Dawi’s own reserves.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Grombrindal is never late, nor ever early – he arrives precisely when needed the most.

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

skillTree.localised_description: Grombrindal’s lustrous white beard is the envy of many a Dwarf. Such fine whiskers can transfix and befuddle any foe!

effects.description:
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +10 when defending 
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: It is unclear how Grombrindal came to be, but his long history of appearances suggest he has crossed the bounds of mortality.
The world changes for the worse; the usual prudence of the Engineers Guild must be tempered! Even they would not deny the White Dwarf!

effects.description:
Ammunition: +33% for Irondrakes and War Machine units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Defence: +12 for Irondrakes and War Machine units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +20% for Irondrakes and War Machine units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Grombrindal’s mere presence drives the Dawi to feats that even the grumbliest Longbeard would laud!

attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

effects.description: Ability number of uses: +4 for "Grombrindal has no fear"

skillTree.localised_description: The throng is overtaken with gnollengrom with a fervour not seen since ages past!
It is the Age of Reckoning; the Ancestor Gods must act now for the good of the Karaz Ankor.

effects.description: Turn time: -10 between each passing of the Living Ancestor event

skillTree.localised_description: Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
Dwarfs are resolute - once they commit to charging the foe, they put all their strength behind that initial blow.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
All Dwarfs despise the Greenskins, for the urki and grobi are the prime agents in the Times of Woe.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +7% when fighting against Greenskins
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Greenskins

skillTree.localised_description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
Dwarfs are not fast, yet they will soldier on, always moving despite any hazards encountered.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: A Lord and his az are never separated, for it is as much part of him as his beard.

skillTree.localised_description: Once the forges burn, under the protection of a living Ancestor, the Guilds put their folk to work. Riches quickly follow.
Few have lived as long as the White Dwarf. Can any Dawi, umgi or even elgi rival such experience?
While all Dwarfs are relentless in their goals – never slowing or slouching – Grombrindal’s determination is on another level altogether.
Dwarfs are not fast, yet they will soldier on, always moving despite any hazards encountered.
You some kind of bearded Elf or a true Dawi? That’s just a scratch, get up!”
When Grombrindal musters the throngs, Dawi from leagues around will come to honour and fight for the living Ancestor.
"The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any attacker.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.
This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

factionEffects.localised_description: Grombrindal, The White Dwarf, is a legendary figure - the mightiest living Dawi warrior.

effects.description:
Evasion chance when using the Underway: +60%
	(all characters)

Weapon strength: +20% when fighting against Elves
	(all armies)
Can call upon the power of the Ancestor Gods

items.colour_text: Replicated by Runesmiths from a single scale wedged between the teeth of a slain Chaos Lord at the pivotal Battle of Thraag, the White Dwarf's armour is able to deflect even the hardest blows.
Long thought lost to time and conflict, Grombrindal's awesome helm inspires already-courageous Dwarfen hearts to even greater acts of bravery.

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +10%

items.colour_text: Grombrindal's cloak was woven by Valaya herself as a token of the love she felt for the White Dwarf, as proven by the skill in needlework displayed.
Mentioned in several sagas and legends, could the White Dwarf's mighty weapon be the fabled rune axe wielded by Grimnir at the dawn of history?

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "You and your followers will die - that is my oath as my kin, Grimnir, is witness!"

effects.description:
Melee defence: +10 for Quarrellers and Irondrakes units
	(Lord's army)
